mod.name: Auto-Buyer Mod
mod.author: Rin
mod.description:
Designed for the new station mode gameplay when station services automate outgoing resources. Automates purchasing of items from NPC ships based on configurable target stock levels using player credits. Uses event-driven logic, respects game physics/trade limits, and calculates needs based on current stock and items in transit.
The mod will automatically buy items when NPC ships arrive in-sector, maintaining your station's stock levels at configured targets. Supports filtering by trade mode (Discounted/Markup), credit limits, and cooldowns.
Features: - Multi-ship prioritization (trades with best available ship) - Automatic retry for new ships (up to 3 attempts before marking as unavailable) - User-configurable markup thresholds (buy at each price level based on stock percentage) - Per-ship trade limits (8 trades per ship per visit, 4 concurrent trades max) - Smart offer caching and refresh logic - 10-second initialization delay for new ships - Shuttle docking trigger for trade rechecks - Configurable logging (disabled for performance by default) - Support for 50+ item types including scrap materials - Logistics-aware trading (slows at 20 items, pauses at 40 items, cancels at 60 items) - Config presets support - save and load multiple configuration profiles
Configuration Presets: - Presets are stored in: [Game Directory]/mods/AutoBuyerMod/presets/ - A sample preset "EarlyGame.json" is included - copy it and edit to create your own custom presets - To use a preset, set {config_preset} in this file to the preset name (without .json extension) - You can create multiple presets for different playstyles (early game, late game, scrap focus, etc.) - Presets can be shared with other players - just copy the .json file to their presets directory - See presets/README.md for detailed instructions
Configuration Options: - {item}: Target stock level - buy if stock falls below this (e.g., {food_root_vegetables}) - Buy Markup Thresholds (percentage of target stock - only buy if stock is below threshold): - {discount_buy_threshold}: Buy Discounted items if stock < this % of target. Default: 100 (always buy if under target) - {normal_buy_threshold}: Buy Normal items if stock < this % of target. Default: 70 - {markup_buy_threshold}: Buy Markup items if stock < this % of target. Default: 40 - {premium_buy_threshold}: Buy Premium items if stock < this % of target. Default: 20 - {allow_markup}: DEPRECATED - Use {markup_buy_threshold} instead. Kept for backward compatibility only. - {max_credits_per_trade}: Maximum credits per trade. Set to 0 for unlimited. Default: 2000 - {min_credit_balance}: Minimum credit balance required to initiate trades. No trades if credits are at or below this amount. Default: 10000 - {cooldown_ticks}: Cooldown between trade attempts per ship in game ticks. 120 ticks = ~2 seconds. Set to 0 to disable. Default: 120 - {enable_logging}: Enable logging to file for debugging (true/false). Logs saved to [Game Directory]/mods/AutoBuyerMod/logs/. Format: AutoBuyerMod_YYYY-MM-DD_HH-MM-SS.log. Default: false (disabled for better performance) - {config_preset}: Preset name to load (optional). Leave empty to use values from this file. Set to preset name (without .json) to load from preset file. Presets stored in [Game Directory]/mods/AutoBuyerMod/presets/. Copy and edit existing presets to create your own.
For Beta 2 (0.21.0) - Experimental Branch
